title: Track and Record Billable Hours
description: An associate attorney needs to record their billable hours for the day for multiple matters.

tasks.description: Review the attorney's calendar and sent emails to identify activities performed during the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies activities like 'Phone call with client A', 'Draft motion for case B'.

tasks.description: For each activity, create a time entry with the correct client/matter code, a detailed description, and the duration in 0.1-hour increments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates multiple, properly formatted time entries.

tasks.description: Submit the completed time entries for partner review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The day's time is successfully recorded in the system.
